result.title: Collected Edition Etudes Digitales (Ethics & Politics)
result.description: The output for T11 and T12 will be a special edition of the peerreviewed Ethics and Politics on the Real Smart City coedited by Fitzpatrick Baranzoni and Vignola and comprising worked up versions of Guayaquil Archipelago interventions This will be ready for submission in M15 and will include At least two articles will focus on the integration of public data into transdisciplinary studies of the Data City with an emphasis on the critique of political issues related to citizenship participation privacy immanent in datacapture regimes At least two articles will focus on the privacy and commercialization of public data smart city data within the EU space Other articles will incorporate perspectives on smart and real smart cities from multiple disciplinary perspectives including eg one by Moore on the risks posed by smart cities to human capacities for environmental niche construction and the potential of new digital tools to recapacitate niche construction which will feed into deliverable 31 In line with UAs performance and implementation of public artworks or interactos UAs Baranzoni will coordinate the creation of two independent high international standard artworks both of which will harness digital methods to generate reflection on the DATA CITY which will feed into the Toolkit Research and Innovation Focus Transdisciplinary Study and the Digital Episteme under deliverable 61 to be published as the second part of the special edition of tudies digitales outlined M24

project.title: Real Smart Cities

result.title: Phase 1 Design: Assessment of successful completion
result.description: A technical Phase Report shall be submitted by the suppliers which shall contain the detailed and description of the solution design of the innovative solution concept proposed in the original bid The Experts Board Panels will be requested to determine whether the suppliers have complied with their obligations under the Framework Agreement the Phase 1 Contract and the Tender Documents The commissioning authority Procuring Entity will release a statement based on an assessment of the Experts Board Panels and will proceed to the complete payment owed to the suppliers for the correct execution of Phase 1
